statements: SELECT * FROM intersections WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT intersection_name, city FROM intersections ORDER BY intersection_name DESC;
SELECT intersection_name, wait_time_minutes FROM intersections WHERE wait_time_minutes > 10;
SELECT * FROM intersections WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND wait_time_minutes < 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM intersections;
SELECT * FROM intersections WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY wait_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT intersection_name, wait_time_minutes FROM intersections WHERE wait_time_minutes > 15 AND city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT intersection_id, city FROM intersections WHERE intersection_name LIKE '%Main%' AND wait_time_minutes < 10;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS total_intersections FROM intersections GROUP BY city ORDER BY total_intersections DESC;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_name, city, wait_time_minutes FROM intersections WHERE wait_time_minutes BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY city, wait_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM intersections;
SELECT intersection_name, traffic_volume FROM intersections;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_name, traffic_volume FROM intersections ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC;
SELECT intersection_name, wait_time FROM intersections INNER JOIN wait_times ON intersections.intersection_id = wait_times.intersection_id;
SELECT intersection_name, date_time, wait_time FROM intersections INNER JOIN wait_times ON intersections.intersection_id = wait_times.intersection_id ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM intersections WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY intersection_name DESC
SELECT intersection_name, coordinates FROM intersections WHERE traffic_volume BETWEEN 50 AND 150 ORDER BY traffic_volume
SELECT intersection_name, coordinates, traffic_volume FROM intersections WHERE traffic_volume > 200 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC, intersection_name ASC

SELECT i.intersection_name, i.coordinates, w.date_time, w.wait_time FROM intersections i INNER JOIN wait_times w ON i.intersection_id = w.intersection_id WHERE w.wait_time > 10 ORDER BY w.wait_time ASC, w.date_time DESC

SELECT i.intersection_id, MAX(w.wait_time) AS max_wait_time FROM intersections i INNER JOIN wait_times w ON i.intersection_id = w.intersection_id GROUP BY i.intersection_id HAVING MAX(w.wait_time) > 20 ORDER BY max_wait_time DESC
SELECT * FROM intersections;
SELECT intersection_name, total_cars FROM intersections ORDER BY total_cars DESC;
SELECT intersection_name, average_wait_time FROM intersections WHERE total_cars > 100;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights WHERE light_color = 'Red';
SELECT car_id, car_type FROM cars ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM intersections LIMIT 5;
SELECT intersection_name, total_cars FROM intersections WHERE average_wait_time > 10;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_name, SUM(total_cars) AS total_cars_sum FROM intersections GROUP BY intersection_id, intersection_name;
SELECT * FROM traffic_lights LEFT JOIN intersections ON traffic_lights.intersection_id = intersections.intersection_id;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_name, car_type FROM intersections JOIN cars ON intersections.intersection_id = cars.intersection_id ORDER BY car_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM Intersections;
SELECT intersection_name, latitude, longitude FROM Intersections WHERE intersection_id = 3;
SELECT signal_id, signal_type, signal_status FROM TrafficSignals ORDER BY signal_id DESC;
SELECT timestamp, vehicle_count FROM TrafficData WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND wait_time_seconds > 30;
SELECT intersection_id, avg_wait_time, start_time, end_time FROM AverageWaitTimes WHERE avg_wait_time < 20 AND start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Intersections;
SELECT intersection_name, latitude, longitude FROM Intersections ORDER BY intersection_name DESC;
SELECT t.signal_id, t.signal_type, i.intersection_name FROM TrafficSignals t JOIN Intersections i ON t.intersection_id = i.intersection_id WHERE t.signal_status = 'green';
SELECT t.timestamp, t.vehicle_count, a.avg_wait_time FROM TrafficData t JOIN AverageWaitTimes a ON t.intersection_id = a.intersection_id WHERE t.wait_time_seconds > 60 ORDER BY t.timestamp DESC;

SELECT i.intersection_name, COUNT(t.data_id) AS data_count FROM Intersections i LEFT JOIN TrafficData t ON i.intersection_id = t.intersection_id GROUP BY i.intersection_id HAVING data_count > 5 ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM intersections;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_name FROM intersections;
SELECT intersection_id, intersection_location FROM intersections ORDER BY intersection_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, traffic_logs.wait_time_seconds FROM vehicles JOIN traffic_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = traffic_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type_name FROM vehicles JOIN vehicle_types ON vehicles.vehicle_type_id = vehicle_types.vehicle_type_id;
SELECT intersection_name FROM intersections WHERE intersection_location LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT * FROM traffic_signals WHERE signal_status = TRUE ORDER BY intersection_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, wait_time_seconds FROM vehicles JOIN traffic_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = traffic_logs.vehicle_id WHERE wait_time_seconds > 60 ORDER BY wait_time_seconds ASC;
